arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS: How did Carlisle United fare against Morecambe?
arts.sum: RATINGS: Carlisle United claimed a vital 2-0 win over Morecambe – so how did we score the players at the Mazuma Mobile Stadium?

arts.ttl: Kelly and Thomas fire Carlisle United to vital win against Morecambe
arts.sum: REPORT: Goals from Georgie Kelly and Terell Thomas earned Carlisle United a vital 2-0 win at Morecambe to boost their survival hopes.

arts.ttl: Carlisle boost survival hopes with win at fellow strugglers Morecambe
Why no-excuse Ellis is a Carlisle United pro worth backing
arts.sum: JON COLMAN: Defender Ellis never seems to need the explanations and excuses made for others when he's called upon. His comeback is timely.

arts.ttl: Morecambe boss on 'vital' contest against Carlisle United
arts.sum: Morecambe manager Derek Adams says victory is “vital” against Carlisle United – but insists that defeat would not be terminal.

arts.ttl: Hughes on Carlisle United's 'confidence' in striker Kelly's fitness
arts.sum: Head coach Mark Hughes believes Carlisle United can reap the benefit of patience with striker Georgie Kelly.

arts.ttl: Owners: Why Carlisle United will suffer 'significant loss' this season
arts.sum: Carlisle United’s owners have explained why the club is expected to suffer a “significant” financial loss in 2024/25.

It's a relegation six pointer this weekend as 23rd placed Morecambe face 24th placed Carlisle. Morecambe's 3-1 defeat to Grimsby last weekend was their third defeat in their last six games. Carlisle...
